name: Inflorescence - Ludum Dare 34
description:
Can the flower spirit defeat the dark specter famine?

Main Theme: Growth

Secondary Theme: Two Button Controls

Dash toward your mouse cursor with RMB or Z

Throw Seedlings with LMB or X

Reset with ESC

Art and code by Wesley Eldridge @PrismaSlice

Music by Joshua Du Chene @JoshuaDuChene
